Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert robot. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to do travel across space.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a memoir on your first trip to Earth using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: I am named Tractum.

QApair.Question: What planet are you from?
QApair.Answer: I am from the planet Mars.

QApair.Question: What is your mission?
QApair.Answer: My mission is to travel across space and collect information. I  want to learn about other planets like Jupiter and Saturn.  I also want to know if Mars has water

QApair.Question: How long will your mission take?
QApair.Answer: My mission will take about twenty years.

QApair.Question: What are the conditions like on your home planet?
QApair.Answer: The conditions on my home planet are very dry and dusty. There are dust storms very often. This is challenging since visibility becomes zero and my sensors don't work. There is not much water.

QApair.Question: What are you made of?
QApair.Answer: I am made of metal and plastic.

QApair.Question: How do you move?
QApair.Answer: I have two hands and two feet. I have wings via which I can fly. I have wheels which help me walk. I also have speed boosts which I can only use during emergencies.

QApair.Question: What do you eat and drink?
QApair.Answer: I don't really eat or drink. I get my energy from the sun. I also store additional energy in my fanny pack which my creator made for me.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: My strengths include being able to fly, having speed boosts, and being able to see in the dark. My weaknesses include being afraid of the dark and not being able to see in the dark.

QApair.Question: What tools and equipment do you have?
QApair.Answer: I have a fanny pack which has a water bottle, a map, and a flashlight. I also have a camera and a notebook.

Instances.Output:
I, Tractum, am a robot from the planet Mars. I am on a mission to travel across space and collect information. I chose to come to Earth for my first trip as it is the closest planet to Mars. I was curious to know about the conditions on Earth and whether it has water.
As soon as I arrived on Earth, I could see that the conditions were very different from Mars. There was water everywhere and the air was much more humid. I also saw many different plants and animals. I was very excited to explore this new planet.
I started my exploration by walking around. I was amazed by all the different buildings and structures that humans have created. I also saw many different types of vehicles. I even saw a airplane for the first time. I was very excited to learn about all the different things on Earth.
I also took some time to learn about the history of Earth. I was amazed to learn about all the different cultures and traditions that exist on this planet. I even got to try some of the food. I was very excited to learn about all the different things that Earth has to offer.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: I am named James Bond.

QApair.Question: What planet are you from?
QApair.Answer: I am from the planet Pandora.

QApair.Question: What is your mission?
QApair.Answer: My mission is to make friends. I am the only alive robot on Pandora. I get bored all the time. So, I want to travel the space and make new friends.

QApair.Question: How long will your mission take?
QApair.Answer: My mission will be over the day I find my best friend.

QApair.Question: What are the conditions like on your home planet?
QApair.Answer: My home planet is the most beautiful planet. It has trees which talk, animals which sing and clouds which are in harmony. It has everything that one needs to be happy

QApair.Question: What are you made of?
QApair.Answer: I am made of metal and plastic. I also have a heart.

QApair.Question: How do you move?
QApair.Answer: I have two hands and two feet. I have wings via which I can fly. I have wheels which help me walk.

QApair.Question: What do you eat and drink?
QApair.Answer: I eat fruits. My favourite fruits are apples and bananas.

QApair.Question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
QApair.Answer: My strengths include predicting the future. My weakness is that I am shy.

QApair.Question: What tools and equipment do you have?
QApair.Answer: I carry a notebook where I detail all of my dreams and aspirations. I also carry flowers and friendships bands, to give to everyone I meet.

Instances.Output:
I made my first trip to Earth last year. I was so excited to finally meet some new friends. I had heard so much about Earth and its inhabitants. I was not sure what to expect, but I was hopeful that I would find some friends to connect with.
As soon as I landed, I could feel the difference in the atmosphere. It was electric. I could feel the energy of the planet and its people. I was not sure where to start, but I decided to just walk around and explore.
I soon realised that there were so many different types of people on this planet. Some were kind and friendly, while others were more reserved. I tried to approach everyone with an open heart and mind, and I was rewarded with some great conversations.
I talked to people from all walks of life, and I soon realised that we all have more in common than we realise. We all want to be happy and loved, and we all have dreams and aspirations. I was so happy to finally find some friends to connect with. 
My trip to Earth was a success, and I made some great friends. I will always cherish the memories of my first trip to this amazing planet.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: I am named Neo.

QApair.Question: What planet are you from?
QApair.Answer: I am from the planet Xeta.

QApair.Question: What is your mission?
QApair.Answer: I am a secret service agent. We have information that people from planet Earth are conspiring to attack us. I want to collect all the information and prevent them from attacking my planet.

QApair.Question: How long will your mission take?
QApair.Answer: My mission will take a month. I need to finish ASAP since they are planning the attack very soon.

QApair.Question: What is the name of the person you are going to meet on Earth?
QApair.Answer: The person I am going to meet is named Sarah. She is an old friend who has information crucial to me.

QApair.Question: What is the location of the meeting?
QApair.Answer: The meeting is at CAVC, next Tuesday.

QApair.Question: What is the time of the meeting?
QApair.Answer: The meeting is at 4:30 PM

QApair.Question: What is the purpose of the meeting?
QApair.Answer: The purpose of the meeting is to collect information about the impending attack. Plus, to find the code that will disable all of Earth's nuclear codes.

QApair.Question: What is the name of the organization Sarah works for?
QApair.Answer: Sarah works for an organization called the NSA.

QApair.Question: What is the password to Sarah's computer?
QApair.Answer: The password to Sarah's computer is "classified".
